description: Average of digits of each term in A060495, number of balls in each such siteswap juggling pattern.
maple: Perm2SiteSwap2 := proc(p) local ip,n,i,a; n := nops(p); ip := convert(invperm(convert(p,'disjcyc')),'permlist',n); a := []; for i from 1 to n do if(0 = ((ip[i]-i) mod n)) then a := [op(a), n]; else a := [op(a),((ip[i]-i) mod n)]; fi; od; RETURN(a); end;
author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 22 2001
